actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to authorize, with respect to certain grants to assist voluntary family planning projects, the expenditure of grant funds for the purpose of providing adoption services.
subjects: Abortion, Birth Control, and Family Planning

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to permit certain voluntary family planning projects to offer adoption services. Requires such services to be nondiscriminatory as to race, color, religion, or national origin.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to authorize, with respect to certain grants to assist voluntary family planning projects, the expenditure of grant funds for the purpose of providing adoption services.
